title: LF Duo Bot Support
body: I'm currently a Draven one-trick but I can play Vayne decently well. I'm in Bronze III but S8 is my first season and I was dumb enough to start my placements at level 30. I do prefer playing with Tanky supports like Thresh, Leona, Blitzcrank & Alistar but less tanky AP's like Morgana & Janna are fine.

replies.body: i mite be able to help
